PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-03342015-03-17,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActConstitution Act, 1867
SubjectAdministration of the Oath of Allegiance
PrecisOrder authorizing the persons occupying any of the following positions (a) Clerk of the House of Commons; (b) Deputy Clerk of the House of Commons; (c) Sergeant-at-Arms of the House of Commons; (d) Law Clerk and Parliamentary Counsel of the House of Commons; and (e) Clerk Assistant of the House of Commons to administer the OATH OF ALLEGIANCE contained in the Fifth Schedule to the Constitution Act, 1867 to every member of the House of Commons and to have that power during their tenure of office.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
